comments.author: Sebb
comments.body:
http://www.apache.org/dist/jakarta/httpcomponents/commons-httpclient-3.x/RELEASE-NOTES.txt

should be

http://www.apache.org/dist/jakarta/httpcomponents/commons-httpclient-3.x/RELEASE_NOTES.txt

or the file should be renamed...

comments.author: Roland Weber
comments.body:
I've changed the link and redeployed the site. It should be synced within a few hours.

Thanks for spotting this,
  Roland

description:
On http://jakarta.apache.org/httpcomponents/httpclient-3.x/downloads.html
the link to the release notes is broken
summary: broken link to the release notes
